TEXT: The applicant , Mr ORG , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant was arrested and questioned as a suspect in the context of criminal proceedings for robbery . Another person , LJ , was suspected of being his accomplice .
On DATE the Kaunas ORG ordered the applicant ’s detention on remand for DATE .
On DATE the court extended the term of his remand in custody for DATE .
On DATE the applicant ’s remand was varied by the decision of a prosecutor , and he was placed under house arrest .
On DATE the bill of indictment was confirmed , and the case was transmitted for trial .
On DATE the Kaunas ORG adjourned the trial as ORG had absconded .

On the same date the court ordered the applicant ’s bail - with the written obligation not to leave . It was indicated in the bail decision that appeal lay to ORG against that order , but the applicant did not appeal .
On DATE the court renewed the examination of the case against the applicant .
On DATE ORG dismissed the ORG appeal challenging the acquittal .
On DATE ORG rejected the ORG cassation appeal . That decision was final .
